vocabinfos.lsjDefs:
Ζεβεδαῖος, -ου, ὁ (Heb. זְבַדְיָה; LXX: Ζαβδειά, Est.8:8 10:20; Ζαβαδαῖας, I Est.9:35; Ζαβαδαῖος, I Est.9:21)
Zebedee, father of James and John the Apostles: Mat.4:21 10:2 20:20 26:37 27:56, Mrk.1:19-20 3:17 10:35, Luk.5:10, Jhn.21:2.†
(From Abbott-Smith. LSJ has no entry)
vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of the New Testament, first mentioned at Mat.4.21;
father of: James (G2385), John (G2491H)
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
西庇太 这个陽性專有名詞在希伯來文的意思是 "我的禮物"
加利利的漁夫, 使徒雅各和雅各兄弟約翰的父親，撒羅米的丈夫
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
西庇太 这个阳性专有名词在希伯来文的意思是 "我的礼物"
加利利的渔夫, 使徒雅各和雅各兄弟约翰的父亲，撒罗米的丈夫
vocabinfos._vi_Definition: Xê-bê-đê « Giê-hô-va đã cho ». Xem H2067

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A woman living at the time of the New Testament, first mentioned at Mat.20.20;
unnamed wife of: Zebedee (G2199);
mother of: James (G2385) and John (G2491H)
